game.name: Mushi
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Welcome to Mushi! The next-gen Auto-RPG set in a rich fantasy world. This is a feature-packed incremental idle game, meaning that it mostly plays on its own. Your hero will automatically defeat enemies and level up on your screen while you do other things. Begin your rise from level 1 today!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Welcome to Mushi! The next-gen Auto-RPG set in a rich fantasy world. This is a feature-packed incremental idle game, meaning that it mostly plays on its own. Your hero will automatically defeat enemies and level up on your screen while you do other things. Begin your rise from level 1 today!
